fact_report.claim: The UWCL features 16 teams in the group stage split into four groups playing double round-robin, with the top two advancing to two-legged quarterfinals and semifinals.

sources.name: UEFA Women’s Champions League Regulations 2024/25
sources.quote: Sixteen clubs contest the group stage in four groups of four, playing home-and-away; the first and second-placed teams qualify for the quarter-finals played over two legs, as are the semi-finals.

fact_report.claim: Champions from the top three associations plus the titleholder’s league receive automatic group berths, passing to the fourth-ranked association if the holder already has a slot.

sources.name: UEFA Access List — Women’s Club Competitions
sources.quote: Associations ranked 1–3 each enter one club directly in the group stage, as does the titleholder's association; if the titleholder has already qualified via its domestic league, the berth passes to the champion of the next association in the rankings.

fact_report.claim: DAZN holds global streaming rights for the UWCL with selected matches free on UEFA.tv/YouTube, and monthly pricing around $19.99 in the U.S.

sources.name: DAZN x UEFA Women’s Champions League Rights Announcement
sources.quote: DAZN holds global rights to broadcast every UEFA Women’s Champions League match, with select fixtures available free-to-air on DAZN’s YouTube channel and UEFA.tv.

sources.name: DAZN U.S. Subscription Terms
sources.quote: DAZN monthly subscription in the United States is $19.99 with full access to live and on-demand content.

fact_report.claim: Group-stage kickoff windows run at 18:45 CET and 21:00 CET on Wednesdays/Thursdays.

sources.name: UEFA 2024/25 UWCL Match Calendar
sources.quote: Group stage matchdays are scheduled on Wednesdays and Thursdays with centralized kick-off times of 18.45 CET and 21.00 CET.

research_log.quote: Sixteen clubs play home-and-away group matches; top two advance to two-legged quarter-finals and semi-finals.
Associations 1–3 and the titleholder receive direct group places; spare berth moves down rankings.
DAZN owns global rights and streams matches worldwide with select matches free-to-air on YouTube/UEFA.tv.
DAZN monthly price in the United States is $19.99.
Group stage kick-off times set at 18.45 CET and 21.00 CET on Wednesdays/Thursdays.
